title: Abused Female Lead And Beautiful Villainess (Quick Transmigration) - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Supernatural   Yuri
tags: Ancient China   Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Cultivation   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Episodic   Fantasy Creatures   Heartwarming   Heavenly Tribulation   Hiding True Identity   Interdimensional Travel   Love at First Sight   Marriage   Modern Day   Multiple Realms   Persistent Love Interests   Power Couple   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnation   Shameless Protagonist   Strong Love Interests   System Administrator   Transmigration   Unconditional Love   Villainess Noble Girls   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping   World Travel
author: 千觅荷
description:
Head of Time and Space Department: Shen Wan, your task is to influence every abnormal and extreme man in the novel world, rewrite and change the original story filled with abuse into a sweet love story, and calm the readers’ grievances.
Shen Wan: No problem.

Transmigrating next to a perverted President, Shen Wan: He wants to dig my kidney for the white moonlight of his heart. Sorry, this can’t be sweetened.
Leader: If you can’t change then you can’t earn money and you can’t come back.
Beautiful girl: This kind of person should be put in prison.
Shen Wan was later taken home by a beautiful woman, the reader said, so sweet.

Transmigrating into Ancient China, Shen Wan: He wants to use my blood to detoxify the cinnabar mole of his heart, it really cannot be sweet.
Leader: You do it.
Beautiful Princess: When I became the Emperor, I will put the elder brother in the fief.
Shen Wan later became the Queen and the readers commented, it was really sweet.

Transmigrating into Xianxia, Shen Wan: He wants to take away my spirit root and stab my heart. It can’t be sweet.
Leader: Please ask the little sister next door.
Beautiful Sister Nun: I cut his dog-head with the sword
Later the witch turned into a fairy. The reader shouted, sweet ah>
